multimail-special-emailaddresses: The name of the extension's entry in Special:SpecialPages
multimail-special-emailaddresses-summary: Description appearing on top of Special:EmailAddresses.
multimail-emails-add-email-button-label: Button label for the button to add a new email address.
multimail-emails-pager-email: Label for the header of the column with email addresses.
multimail-emails-pager-status: Label for the header of the column with the status of the email addresses.
multimail-emails-pager-buttons: Label for the header of the column with buttons to manage a specific email address.
multimail-emails-pager-make-primary-butt: Button label for the button that makes an email address the primary email address.
multimail-emails-pager-primary: Label to indicate the email is the primary email address.
multimail-emails-pager-no-confirmation-n: Label to indicate that the email does not need confirmation.
multimail-emails-pager-primary-confirmed:
Label to indicate the email is the primary email address and was confirmed.

Parameters:
* $1 - Timestamp when the email address was confirmed
multimail-emails-pager-confirmed:
Label to indicate the email was confirmed.

Parameters:
* $1 - Timestamp when the email address was confirmed
multimail-emails-pager-primary-unconfirm: Label to indicate that the email is the primary email address and has not yet been confirmed.
multimail-emails-pager-unconfirmed: Label to indicate that the email is unconfirmed.
multimail-emails-pager-confirm-button-la: Button label for the button that is shown when the confirmation for that email address is pending. It links to a form that will allow resending the email with confirmation link.
multimail-emails-pager-delete-label: Button label for the button that removes a secondary email address. It is invisible by default.
tooltip-multimail-emails-pager-delete-la:
Tooltip for the button that removes a secondary email address.

See also: {{msg-mw|multimail-emails-pager-delete-label}}
multimail-special-add-email-view: Title for the view that shows the form to add a new email address
multimail-special-add-email-view-new-ema: Label message for the form field that will contain the new email address
multimail-invalid-email: Error message shown when the email address is invalid.
multimail-special-add-email-view-submit-: Button label for the submit button for the form that adds a new email address.
multimail-special-add-email-view-confirm: Message shown when the form to add a new email address has been submitted and an email with the url to confirm the email address has been sent to the user.
multimail-special-change-primary-view-co: Button label for the submit button for the form that will change the primary email address.

Confirmation message shown when changing the primary email address.

Parameters:
* $1 - Current primary email address
* $2 - New primary email address
multimail-special-change-primary-view: Title for the form that requests confirmation to change the primary email address.
multimail-special-delete-view-confirmati:
Confirmation message shown when deleting an email address.

Parameters:
* $1 - Email address to be deleted
multimail-special-delete-view:
Title for the form that request confirmation to delete an email address

Parameters:
* $1 - Email address to be deleted
multimail-special-delete-view-confirmati: Button label for the submit button for the form that will delete an email address.
multimail-special-request-confirmation-c: Title for the form that is shown when the email address is not yet confirmed
Button label for the submit button that requests a new confirmation code.
Message shown when a new confirmation code has been sent.
multimail-no-primary-email: Title of the error page shown when the user has no email address set.
multimail-no-primary-body: Error message shown when the user has no email address set.
multimail-email-disabled: Title of the error page shown when emails are disabled
multimail-email-disabled-body: Error message shown when emails are disabled
multimail-manager-primary-email-not-conf: Error message shown when the primary email address is not confirmed when attempting to make a secondary email address primary.
multimail-manager-secondary-email-not-co: Error message shown when the secondary email address is not confirmed when attempting to make the secondary email address primary.
multimail-primary-swapped_subject: Subject of the e-mail sent to user when the primary e-mail address is swapped with a secondary email address.
multimail-primary-swapped_body:
Body of the email sent to user when their primary email address is swapped with a secondary email address.

Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the user
* $2 - the previous primary email address
* $3 - the new primary email address
* $4 - a time and date (duplicated by $7 and $8)
* $5 - the IP address of the user that created or confirmed the email address
* $6 - an URL to [[Special:EmailAddresses]]
* $7 - (Optional) a date
* $8 - (Optional) a time

See also:
* {{msg-mw|multimail-confirmationmail-secondary_body}}.
multimail-confirmationmail-secondary_bod:
Body of the email sent to user when their primary email address is swapped with a secondary email address.

Parameters:
* $1 - the previous primary email address
* $2 - the name of the user
* $3 - an URL to [[Special:EmailAddresses]]
* $4 - a time and date (duplicated by $5 and $6)
* $5 - (Optional) a date
* $6 - (Optional) a time
{{Related|Confirmemail body}}

See also:
* {{msg-mw|multimail-primary-swapped_body}}.
multimail-manager-db-confirmation-code-a: Error message shown when the confirmation code for a secondary email address failed to save in the database.
multimail-manager-db-save-old-primary-fa: Error message shown when the old primary email adddress failed to save in the database.
multimail-manager-address-already-exists: Error message shown when the provide email address is already registered for the account.
multimail-manager-db-add-new-secondary-f: Error message shown when a new email address failed to save in the database.
multimail-emails-invalid-id: Error message title shown when the selected email address is invalid.
multimail-emails-invalid-id-body: Error message shown when the selected email address is invalid. This may mean that the selected email address does not exist, or does not belong to the user viewing it; this difference is deliberately ignored to prevent leaking information.
multimail-manager-no-such-email-in-db: Error message shown when deleting the email failed.
multimail-js-dialog-cancel: Cancel button label for JavaScript dialogs
multimail-js-reauthentication-check: Text displayed when an api request to check the identity of the current user is active.
multimail-js-reauthentication-required:
Text displayed when the identity of the current user needs to be verified.

Parameters:
* $1 - The text of {{mw-msg|ooui-dialog-message-accept}}, which is shown as the label of the button below this message
